org.dyn4j.dynamics

Class DestructionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.dynamics.DestructionAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DestructionListener, Listener

    public class DestructionAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements DestructionListener, Listener
    Convience class for implementing the DestructionListener interface.

    This class can be used to implement only the methods desired instead of all the methods contained in the DestructionListener interface.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    3.1.0
    Author:
    William Bittle

    • Method Detail

      • destroyed

        public void destroyed(ContactPoint contactPoint)
        Description copied from interface: DestructionListener
        Called when implicit destruction of a ContactConstraint has occurred.

        Modification of the World is not permitted during this method.

        Specified by:
        destroyed in interface DestructionListener
        Parameters:
        contactPoint - the ContactPoint that was destroyed
        See Also:
        World.removeBody(Body), World.removeAllBodiesAndJoints(boolean)

      • destroyed

        public void destroyed(Joint joint)
        Description copied from interface: DestructionListener
        Called when implicit destruction of a Joint has occurred.

        Modification of the World is permitted during this method.

        Specified by:
        destroyed in interface DestructionListener
        Parameters:
        joint - the Joint that was destroyed
        See Also:
        World.removeBody(Body), World.removeAllBodiesAndJoints(boolean)
